desc: 60% all parameters (Fire), 200% Fire elemental damage, 120% critical damage, 2 turns spark vulnerability infliction & add to BB/SBB (May purge damage reduction from Fire from all foes)(PvP modes only))
lore:
A powerful orb bestowed upon the best of the best in the 31st Division of the Demon Slayers. Despite its fiercely valiant origins, it is surprisingly gently warm, much like the commander's personable nature.
Named for the fairy that follows the commander on his various adventures, Sun Cuore's demure shyness makes her a rare sight even when Roy is around. However, there is no doubt that she is his—and by association, the division's—first source of inspiration and strength.
name: Sun Cuore's Will
